about_the_game:
ZOM: Rise of the Apocalypse is a dynamic Trading and Collecting Card Game set in a post-apocalyptic world. With both strategic PvP multiplayer battles and an immersive RPG single player story, you'll be fully immersed in the universe of Zom.

Embark on a thrilling journey in the online universe of Zom. Choose your side and engage in strategic battles, using your wits and cunning to outwit your opponents.

Outside of battle, unleash your inner scientist and design custom abilities to dominate the battlefield with the simple yet powerful Ability Graph system. With the power of gene programming at your fingertips, you can create a deck that truly represents you and showcase your unique strategies. The Ability Graph system not only adds an extra layer of depth and customization to the gameplay, but also presents a thrilling opportunity for players to learn and apply concepts common in computer programming.

Join minds with other players to create powerful alliances, or go it alone and forge your own path to glory. The choice is yours.
